name: Only One Way
description:
In this game you can walk only in one direction in each level, but not always the same direction every level is different. In this example level you can only go right maybe in the next level you can only go left? With this concept I wanna build a puzzle game. Leave you feedback and suggestions in the comments. Thanks for reading :D

P.S.: I drew the way to end the level for you with my ultimate paint skills.
